title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions: An online interview - 2 parts. An assessment and then panel interview. Assessment is based on thoughts process and panel interview is to get to know candidates better. The interview has 3 people
Interview Questions: Why make the switch to this industry?

title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: There are several stages. First stage was with senior teachers where scenarios will be shown and questions were answered. Questions asked are about the situations and the things you will do if you are in that position. Then, there are series of essay/short answer questions to be answered via a portal. There is a timer to answer this. Next, panel interviews with Principal and Head of HR.
Interview Questions: What do you think of the scenarios?

title: Teacher Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions: Very Easy, only one interview with principal but this was 8 years ago. I got the job the next day. The interview process now is very different, which is a whole day thing with in class attachment and written assessment
Interview Questions: Tell me why you want to join our organisation

title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore) in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: It was a roundtable discussion with videos shown for the first round, followed by a writing test after that asked mostly questions about passion for the position applied and personal abilities.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply for Rainbow Centre?

title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions:
3 rounds of interview
First round - HR generic questions
Second round - Half day group interview (about 12-15 interviewees and panel of 8-10 interviewers). Includes class attachment
Third round - HR manager
Interview Questions:
Introduce yourself
Why you want to join
Views on compulsory education for SPED

Overall generic questions. 2nd round of interview was unnecessarily long for interviewees because of the number of interviewees. Management could have separated it to different days, but seem to do it all together to save their time.

title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions: Approachable interviewer and will explain the profile and clients that we will have in the center. Will also be looking at experience with special needs and other teaching background  as well
Interview Questions: Describe about yourself and what are the factor that is needed as a special needs educator

title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: All online due to COVID. Firstly was invited for a group interview where we were presented short videos and asked a list of questions about the videos. HR sent us sample questions before the interview. After the group interview, had to submit an essay about inclusiveness. 2 weeks later, was invited to panel interview (lasted about 15 minutes) with the heads of the school and asked generic questions.
Interview Questions: What does the learning environment do for the students?

title: Job Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions:
I had 4 rounds.
1) Online interview with 2 senior JC.
2) Shadow a JC for half day
3) Assessment- paired with a student and was required to "coach" him to do a task
4) Online interview with senior management

In the end, I didn't get the role because I quote " The team is lean and we do not have the resource to train you"
Interview Questions:
Tell us about yourself
What is important for youth with autism 
strength and weakness

title: Assistant Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: There will be 3 rounds of interview. 1st Interview is with a panel of interviewers consists of HR and Directors. 2nd interview is with peer. If you get pass these 2 interviews, congrats you will be on 3rd interview where you will be negotiating pay package and in pre-employment.
Interview Questions: Random questions that they ask - about hobbies, and current work experience and why do you apply for the job?

title: HR Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions: Interview panel involved. Be prepared for the interview and understand why you applied for the job and why you want to work for the organization well.  Do your homework and research well.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply for this role?

title: Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions:
Zoom interview with 3 interviewers, who all read my CV thoroughly and asked about its details at times. Interview was followed by a form containing 3 short essay questions. 

I was eventually rejected - but this was not communicated to me directly. Status was updated on the job portal instead.
Interview Questions: How will you be challenged by this role?

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions: Phone call followed by role playing and case writing assessment. There after, the HR will get back after phoning referee provided by yourself. there will be a final interview with the director of the company to ascertain the success of interview.
Interview Questions: to describe about yourself and usual case assessment question

title: Peer Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Woodlands New Town, ) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions:
First interview was a group interview and you get attached to a class and a debrief 
Second interview is with the head of school and they will ask you questions about why do you want to join a special school
Interview Questions: Why work at a special school?

title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: There are 2 rounds of interview. First was done in a group where candidates are exposed to the nature of work. Second interview was with a panel where expectations of the role for candidate is being laid out.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply for the job?

title: Special Education Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions: Average interview. Asked the basic interview questions. Two interviews were conducted. One was with HR manager and the other with the principal. Good place to work in. Enjoyed thoroughly
Interview Questions: What are you strengths

title: Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions:
It was relatively easy, having to answer 4 to 6 verbal questions and 3 to 4 written questions. 

Email was sent after 2 weeks, and i as the candidate had to go down to the head office to do a verbal and written interview.
Interview Questions: What do you know about autism ?

title: Learning Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions:
1-1 interview process where the interviewer will ask you questions about "what's the most important thing should you always take note of?" and where you see yourself in the future. 

Even if you apply for the job of Learning Facilitator, they will offer you Relief Teacher position for a few months (~ 1 term) and then offer you LF position. 

The hidden terms and condition: 6 months of probation (school holidays will not be counted), should you decide to leave the company before your 6 months of probabtion is up, you'll need to pay for their foundation training (it will be pro-rated according to how long you've worked at the company).
Interview Questions: what's the most important thing should you always take note of?

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions: There were 2 rounds of interview for this position. Each time round, HR would contact the shortlisted candidates for the interview at the last minute. It may be difficult to plan to take leave on short notice. Second round of interview was with one of the senior heads of a department, the ED and a HR staff.
Interview Questions:
How do you think you can contribute to the organisation? 
Why did you leave your previous companies?

title: Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre (Singapore) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: I arrived at Rainbow Center MDS and before the interview, they would get your certificates etc for background check.  I then sat down and waited for the interview. It was running a little later than the stated interview slot, for around 45 minutes. During the interview, there was a panel of 3 (Principal, HR and Executive Director). They were friendly and questions were pretty typical and straightforward. Interview was shorter than I expected, but it seemed like they already had a good idea who they wanted to hire, and the interview was just to ask you some questions and see your personality etc.
Interview Questions: What is your experience with special needs?

title: Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Rainbow Centre
Interview Descriptions: Just one time face to face interview with HR and Principal. The interview process is about 10-15 mins. No test or any difficult question is ask. Pretty simple and straightforward interview.
Interview Questions: No difficult or unexpected question
